about.summary: A Django app providing DB, form, and REST framework fields for zoneinfo and pytz timezone objects.

commands: python -c "import django; from django.conf import settings; settings.configure(DEBUG=True,USE_DEPRECATED_PYTZ=[' VERSION < (4, 0))']); django.setup(); import timezone_field"

about.summary: A Django app providing DB, form, and REST framework fields for zoneinfo and pytz timezone objects.

commands: python -c "import django; from django.conf import settings; settings.configure(DEBUG=True,USE_DEPRECATED_PYTZ=[' VERSION < (4, 0))']); django.setup(); import timezone_field"

name: django-timezone-field
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "django-timezone-field" %}
{% set version = "6.1.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/django_timezone_field-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: d40f7059d7bae4075725d04a9dae601af9fe3c7f0119a69b0e2c6194a782f797

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.7,<4.0
    - poetry-core >=1.0.0
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3.7.0,<4.0.0
    - django >=3.2,<5.0
    - backports.zoneinfo >=0.2.1,<0.3.0
    - pytz

test:
  commands:
    - python -c "import django; from django.conf import settings; settings.configure(DEBUG=True,USE_DEPRECATED_PYTZ=[' VERSION < (4, 0))']); django.setup(); import timezone_field"
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip

about:
  home: https://github.com/mfogel/django-timezone-field/
  summary: A Django app providing DB, form, and REST framework fields for zoneinfo and pytz timezone objects.
  license: BSD-2-Clause
  license_file: LICENSE.txt

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - rxm7706
